tool_description: Detects and extracts pagination information from e-commerce listing pages to enable systematic traversal of multi-page results.

base_url.description: Base URL for resolving relative pagination links

max_pages.description: Maximum number of pages to process

error_messages: No pagination found: No pagination elements detected in the HTML content
Invalid base URL: Provide a valid base URL for resolving relative links
Invalid page numbers: Current page and max pages must be positive integers
Pagination parsing failed: Unable to extract pagination information from the provided HTML
usage: Provide HTML content from a listing page along with the base URL. The tool extracts pagination links and information for systematic page traversal.
